title: CULTIVATE Module 1 Participant Announcement
description: in-tangible institute is pleased to announce the inaugural cohort of CULTIVATE: Professional Development for Curators and Arts Managers. Each of the 5 CULTIVATE modules brings world-renowned faculty to Bangkok to develop select arts professionals with skills and networks to distinguish themselves and their affiliates as leading facilitators of contemporary art in the region and beyond. Module 1 is co-organized by Bangkok Art and Culture Centre (Asian Culture Council Grantee, 2024).
location: BACC สถานที่หอศิลปวัฒนธรรมแห่งกรุงเทพมหานคร และออนไลน์
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
